data.eml:eml: The parerigonine genus Paropesia Mesnil (Diptera, Tachinidae), with descriptions of three new species from East Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shima, Hiroshi (2014): The parerigonine genus Paropesia Mesnil (Diptera, Tachinidae), with descriptions of three new species from East Asia. Zootaxa 3827 (4): 576-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3827.4.8
